description: Try our easy to follow Eton Mess With Passionfruit & Mango recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Eton Mess With Passionfruit & Mango Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, break the meringues into large pieces. Reserving a few slices of mango for garnish, layer the meringue, yoghurt, passionfruit and mango into large glasses, then top with the reserved mango.
